game.name: CONTRAXIS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Contraxis is a fast-paced 2.5D arcade action game where you trace, capture, and command escaped prisoners in the prison city of Axis. Master quick reflexes, summon assists, and survive escalating bosses to chase the highest score.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Contraxis is a fast-paced 2.5D arcade action game where you trace, capture, and command escaped prisoners in the prison city of Axis. Master quick reflexes, summon assists, and survive escalating bosses to chase the highest score.
